long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shows crypto news as a scrollbar on the pages you visit.

The news is updated every 15 minutes, helping you to follow it up-to-date without having to enter another screen.

Source : cryptopanic.com

Features :

Theme: You can set the marquee as you want by choosing one of four different themes.

Location : You can make the ticker appear as a top band or a bottom band.

Speed: You can follow crypto news by choosing one of 4 different options.
